response.overview: Enter Psychosis is a seven-minute short film that pulls viewers into the fractured mind of a young man losing his grip on reality. As his surroundings shift and twist in response to his inner turmoil, the line between the real and the imagined collapses. The film blends cold, immersive visuals with a tense electronic score to create an atmosphere that feels both intimate and unsettling. Enter Psychosis is a sensory dive into a moment of psychological breakdown, capturing a transformation that is as haunting as it is mesmerizing.
response.title: Enter Psychosis
